CustomField.description: Replacing the old opportunity value field - value depends on records type name - be careful if record type name changes
CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( AND( Owning_Country__c <> 'United Kingdom', TEXT(StageName) = 'Proposal Signed' , LastStageChangeDate <= DATETIMEVALUE( "2021-07-09 00:00:00" ) , OwnerId <> '00524000001CTFbAAO' ),
AND( (TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c + DCC_Annual_Gross_Profit1__c + Net_Commission__c + Payments_Annual_GP__c + Pay_by_Link_Annual_GP__c) > (Total_Acquiring_Profit__c + Total_Charges__c + Total_DCC_Profit__c + TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c), (Total_Acquiring_Profit__c + Total_Charges__c + Total_DCC_Profit__c + TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c) = 0.00 ) ) ,
TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c + DCC_Annual_Gross_Profit1__c + Net_Commission__c + Payments_Annual_GP__c + Pay_by_Link_Annual_GP__c + Total_Hardware_Annualized_Recurring_Fees__c + Total_Hardware_One_Off_Cost__c, /*opp value*/
Total_Acquiring_Profit__c + Total_Charges__c + Total_DCC_Profit__c + TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c + Total_Subscription_Fees__c + Total_Hardware_Annualized_Recurring_Fees__c + Total_Hardware_One_Off_Cost__c + Total_Gateway_Processing_Fees__c + Total_Partner_Gross_Profit__c /*total opp value*/ )
/*Total_Acquiring_Profit__c + Total_Charges__c + Total_DCC_Profit__c + TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c */
CustomField.label: Total Opportunity Value
